body:
Anticipate openPMD-api changes in the next major release that are already in `dev` (aka Spack `develop`):
- C++17 requirement
- drop: `mpark-variant` public dependency
- add: `toml11` private dependency

Also adds @franzpoeschel as co-maintainer for the Spack package.

- [x] depends on #29483
title: Prepare: openPMD-api 0.15.0-dev
